channel.title: Someone Please Read this! I've wasted my whole day trying to figure this out!
channel.description: Please, All I want is to connect my 525 to my server IP. please help me! I've added it to applet_sub1.java, client.java and client2.java! Please help! all it does is gets to connected to update server and the server listener says new session and then session closed! HELP! I'm gonna go Insane if you don't help me! Please! Come on people! Help me!

item.title: Someone Please Read this! I've wasted my whole day trying to figure this out!
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Please, All I want is to connect my 525 to my server IP. please help me! I’ve added it to applet_sub1.java, client.java and client2.java! Please help! all it does is gets to connected to update server and the server listener says new session and then session closed! HELP! I’m gonna go Insane if you don’t help me! Please! Come on people! Help me!
